channel.title: Updates on Evan Matthews

item.title: Update: Python Compatability
Update: Comments & Future Articles
item.description: ðŸ’¡ You can read the bolded sections of this post to get the TL;DR. Hey everyone, I’m proud to announce that my blog posts now have comments! You can use this section to leave feedback, continue topic discussions or suggest edits. I only ask that everyone be kind and courteous to each other, (please don’t force me to moderate negative/toxic comments or remove commenting entirely). Additionally, I’ve replaced the previous “Articles” tab with “Audio Processing” as I’m starting to make audio processing tutorials.
